body.p: The Board decided to require the second method, ie that the financial statements of any entity (whether a stand‑alone entity, a parent or an operation within a group) whose functional currency differs from the presentation currency used by the reporting entity are translated using the method set out in paragraphs 38–49 of the Standard.
